name: 布兰登·尼古拉斯
name_full: 布兰登·尼古拉斯 Brandon Nicholas
introduction: Brandon Nicholas completed his first feature-length film, Beauty in Chaos, the gritty story of a photographer in World War II, at the age of 19. Shortly after it's premiere he enrolled at Art Center College of Design where he furthered his study of film.In 2011, Nicholas' sophomore directorial achievement, Desert Son, was released with a strong festival run and positive reviews. Later that year Brandon followed with the final segment in the five part feature "Do Not Disturb." The film features a theme by renowned composer Danny Elfman.Brandon resides in Los Angeles where he works as a director and production designer on features, music videos and narrative projects.
